## App

- This app is a an app that calculates the number of calories you burn on the treadmill based on your inputs

--- 

## Selections

- The inputs include:

1. Duration
2. Weight
3. Speed


---

## Weird Selections

- You are also asked if you are human or dog

---

## Output

- The output calculates the number of calories you burn on the treadmill
- Enjoy!
